subject: Application has been accepted
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$284,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when our best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!!
http://pearylwonder.com/
